text: Table 1 Truncal regional anaesthesia techniques. Paravertebral block (PVE) Erector spinae plane block (ESP) Serratus anterior plane block (SAPB) Pectoral plane blocks (PECs I and II) Rectus sheath block (RSB) Transversus abdominal plane (TAP) block Quadratus lumborum block (QLB) llioinguinal and ilichypogastric nerve blocks
